Venue.Name: CPE
Venue.Titles: 1 Qualifying Leg each of Colors and Wildcard
1 Qualifying Leg each of Snooker and Jackpot
1 Qualifying Leg each of FullHouse and Jumpers
CL1-R, CL1-H, CL1-S, CL1-F This "title" is just an abbreviation of the above. It is not a actual title.
2 Clean Q Legs, or 3 Qualifying Legs
2 Qualifying Legs each of Colors and Wildcard
2 Qualifying Legs each of Snooker and Jackpot
2 Qualifying Legs each of FullHouse and Jumpers
CL2-R, CL2-H, CL2-S, CL2-F This "title" is just an abbreviation of the above. It is not a actual title.
3 Clean Q Legs, or 4 Qualifying Legs
2 Qualifying Legs each of Colors and Wildcard
2 Qualifying Legs each of Snooker and Jackpot
2 Qualifying Legs each of FullHouse and Jumpers
CL3-R, CL3-H, CL3-S, CL3-F This "title" is just an abbreviation of the above. It is not a actual title.
4 Clean Q Legs, or 5 Qualifying Legs
2 Qualifying Legs each of Colors and Wildcard
2 Qualifying Legs each of Snooker and Jackpot
2 Qualifying Legs each of FullHouse and Jumpers
CL4-R, CL4-H, CL4-S, CL4-F This "title" is just an abbreviation of the above. It is not a actual title.
Standard: 8 Clean Q Legs or 10 Qualifying Legs Games: 4 Qualifying Legs of each game

5000 points, 3000 by class requirements, 2000 by handler choice. Standard: 500 pts (20 legs) Colors: 300 pts (20 legs) Wildcard: 400 pts (20 legs) Jackpot: 500 pts (20 legs) Snooker: 500 pts (20 legs) FullHouse: 400 pts (20 legs) Jumpers: 400 pts (20 legs)
3 qualifying legs. They may or may not be with the same dog, and may or may not be in the same level.
8 clean or 10 qualifying legs in Level 5.
Will need to obtain a total of 750 points, which must include at least 4 legs in 4 of the 7 classes offered by CPE, handler choice.
Will need to obtain a total of 2500 points. All points and legs from the Specialist Champion count towards the Specialist Extraordinaire totals.

Scoring.Note: Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults

Event.Name: Colors
Event.Desc: Successfully run your choice of one of the three over-lapping mini-agility courses on the same field.

Scoring.Note: Faults allowed: 4 time faults
Faults allowed: 3 time faults
Faults allowed: 3 time faults
Faults allowed: 4 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 4 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 5 time faults

Event.Name: Wildcard
Event.Desc: Successfully complete the course including enough "wildcards" to qualify!

Scoring.Note: WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 4 time faults
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 3 time faults
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 3 time faults
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 4 time faults
WildCard: 2 1pt, 1 2pt Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 4 time faults
WildCard: 2 1pt, 1 2pt Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults

Event.Name: Snooker
Event.Desc: To test the course planning strategies of the handler, and the dog's ability to concentrate on and execute the handlers directions.

Event.Name: Jackpot
Event.Desc: To test the course planning strategies of the handler, and the dog's ability to work at a distance.

Event.Name: FullHouse
Event.Desc: Successfully accumulate required points for your respective level, that includes a pair, three of a kind and a joker, before the whistle. 3 of a kind: 3 jumps (1 pt each) 2 of a kind: 2 "circles" (3 pts each) joker: 1 contact, weaves, broad, double, triple (5 pts each)

Event.Name: Jumpers
Event.Desc: Successfully complete course within fault limits and course time.

Scoring.Note: Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults

Event.Name: Gamblers
Event.Desc: Traditional

Scoring.Note: Opening: 25 seconds
Opening: 30 seconds
Opening: 30 seconds
Opening: 30 seconds

Event.Name: Time Gamble
Event.Desc: Strategic Time

Scoring.Note: Opening: 30 seconds. 25 pts earns a time bonus that adds or subtracts 1 second to the advantage of the team
Opening: 30 seconds. 25 pts earns a time bonus that adds or subtracts 1 second to the advantage of the team
Opening: 30 seconds. 25 pts earns a time bonus that adds or subtracts 1 second to the advantage of the team
Opening: 30 seconds. 30 pts earns a time bonus that adds or subtracts 1 second to the advantage of the team

Event.Name: Trigility
Event.Desc: Team event with 3 parts: Standard, Jumpers, Gamble. Time+Faults, plus successful gamble

Venue.Name: NADAC
Venue.Desc: http://www.nadac.com/ Note: As of 12/10/2005, NADAC no longer tracks points in different divisions. All of the -V and -JH titles are gone. For simplicity, the new Categories are being treated as Divisions.

Venue.Titles: Proficient Elite points: 230 Regular, 130 Chances, 130 Jumpers. Each subsequent NATCH requires an additional 200 Regular, 100 Chances, 100 Jumpers points.
Proficient Elite points: 230 Regular, 130 of each other class. Each subsequent Vers-NATCH requires an additional 200 Regular, 100 of each other class.

Titles.LongName: Elite Touch N Go Skilled Outstanding Performance
Titles.Name: O-TGS-E

Titles.LongName: Elite Touch N Go Skilled Superior Performance
Titles.Name: S-TGS-E

Venue.Titles: Skilled Elite: 230 Regular pts, 130 Jumpers pts, and 130 pts in one of the other classes.
Skilled Elite: 230 Regular pts, 130 Jumpers pts, and 130 pts in two of the other classes.
Skilled Elite: 430 Regular pts, 230 in each of Jumpers, Tunnelers, TouchNGo and Weavers.
Skilled Elite: 630 Regular pts, 330 in each of Jumpers, Tunnelers, TouchNGo and Weavers.
Skilled Elite: 830 Regular pts, 430 in each of Jumpers, Tunnelers, TouchNGo and Weavers.
Superior Performance titles in Novice Regular, Jumpers, Chances.
Superior Performance titles in Open Regular, Jumpers, Chances.
Superior Performance titles in Elite Regular, Jumpers, Chances.
Triple Superior Performance in all three levels.
Titled in all six classes at Novice
Titled in all six classes at Open
Titled in all six classes at Elite
Superior Performance award in all six classes at Novice level
Superior Performance award in all six classes at Open level
Superior Performance award in all six classes at Elite level
Superior Performance award in all six classes at all three levels
Special certificate earned at 1000. Also at 2500, 5000, etc career pts.

Venue.Name: TDAA
Venue.Titles: 3 Qs in standard courses under 2 different judges
3 Qs in standard courses under 2 different judges
5 Qs in standard courses under 3 different judges
3 Qs in at least 2 different games under 2 different judges
3 Qs in at least 3 different games under 2 different judges
5 Qs in at least 5 different games under 3 different judges
TSAD + 10 Qs in Superior with 3 wins TG3 + 10 Qs in at least 5 games with 3 wins (Each successive title is +5Qs and +2 wins

Event.Name: Game: Faults/Time
Event.Desc: This is for events scored like Standard.

Event.Name: Game: Time+Faults
Event.Desc: This is for Time plus Fault events. Time faults are not added.

Event.Name: Game: Total Points
Event.Desc: Points are accumulated in a single time period, like Snooker.

Event.Name: Game: Open/Close Points
Event.Desc: Points are accumulated separately in the opening and closing, like Gamblers.

Event.Name: Game: Relay
Event.Desc: This is for events run with one or more partners.

Venue.Name: UKC
Venue.Titles: 3 Qs in either A or B.
3 Qs in either A or B.
100 pts from B, 40 must be from AgI, 40 must be from AgII
5 triple-Qs with a combined score of 588 or higher, 2 of the combined wins must be under at least 2 different judges.

Venue.Name: USDAA
Venue.Titles: Starters Standard Agility title plus 1 qualifying score in each of the 4 Starters nonstandard classes. [Before 1/1/2004] 3 Qs earned from at least 2 different judges
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores with 3 different partners under at least 2 different judges.
Advanced Standard Agility title plus 1 qualifying score in each of the 4 Advanced nonstandard classes. [Before 1/1/2004] 3 Qs earned from at least 2 different judges
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores with 3 different partners under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores in the Masters Standard Agility class plus 1 qualifying score in each of the 4 Masters nonstandard classes.
5 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
5 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
5 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
5 qualifying scores with at least 3 Super Qs earned under at least 2 different judges.
5 qualifying scores with 5 different partners under at least 2 different judges.

SAM, JM, GM, SM, RM, plus 5 qualifying scores in tournament competition with at least 1 qualifying score in each tournament [Earned MAD before 1/1/2005] MAD, JM, GM, SM, RM, plus 4 Standard Qs [Earned MAD before 1/1/2000] MAD, JM, GM, SM, RM
10 qualifying scores in tournament competition with at least 2 qualifying scores in each tournament.
15 qualifying scores in tournament competition with at least 3 qualifying scores in each tournament.
25 qualifying scores in tournament competition with at least 5 qualifying scores in each tournament.
35 qualifying scores in tournament competition with at least 7 qualifying scores in each tournament.
50 qualifying scores in tournament competition with at least 10 qualifying scores in each tournament.

50 qualifying scores in Masters Standard class
